However, Gustave's world changes when a young man named Adrien is assigned to work at Gustave's hotel as an assistant concierge to help him learn about running a hotel business.

As Adrien learns more about running a hotel business, he starts to see how Gustave has run his hotel business with skill and integrity since he took over the hotel from his mentor Mr. Moustafa after World War II.
